channel.title: [request] help [request]
channel.description:
[b]Hello, i am currently working on a 508 loading 525 cache and when people spawn nulls and protect them on my server, they dont lose anything... so how do i make it so you cannot spawn anything over the itemID - 15000
please help!!!!!!!!![/b]
[b] UPDATED THIS IS WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE..........
Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java: 328: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemID location: class net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler.Commands if ((itemID >= 14606 && itemAmount >= 0)) { ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java: 328: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemAmount location: class net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler.Commands if ((itemID >= 14606 && itemAmount >= 0)) { ^ Note: .\net\com\codeusa\clanchat\Room.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
How can i fix that if this is my code in commands.java
if ((itemID >= 14606 && itemAmount >= 0)) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You Cant Spawn That Much Of This Item"); p.getActionSender().addSoundEffect(p, 4039, 1, 0, 0); return; }[/b]

item.title: [request] help [request]
item.dc:creator: @JavaGuru JavaGuru™
item.description:
@JavaGuru wrote:

Uhh this is a option i don’t know if it will work.

Implent a code into your server that will make spawning nulls impossible but the hard thing on this is you need to find out witch id’s it are or just look at the pk server the 508’s for example on most of them when you do like ::pickup 7462 (barrow gloves) it says you need 40 pk points to spawn this.
Just copy that and instead of the barrow glove id put in the nullls id and the amounth of pkpoints just put in 9999 because if someone has a life they wont prob get 9999 pk points but you can raise that and change the text to like “you can’t spawn nulls”

Read full topic

item.title: [request] help [request]

item.description:
@obpkreborn wrote:

[b]Hello, i am currently working on a 508 loading 525 cache and when people spawn nulls and protect them on my server, they dont lose anything… so how do i make it so you cannot spawn anything over the itemID - 15000

please help!!![/b]

[b]
UPDATED THIS IS WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE…

Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java
.\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java: 328: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable itemID
location: class net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler.Commands
if ((itemID >= 14606 && itemAmount >= 0)) {
^
.\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\Commands.java: 328: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable itemAmount
location: class net.com.codeusa.net.packethandler.Commands
if ((itemID >= 14606 && itemAmount >= 0)) {
^
Note: .\net\com\codeusa\clanchat\Room.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

How can i fix that if this is my code in commands.java

if ((itemID >= 14606 && itemAmount >= 0)) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You Cant Spawn That Much Of This Item”);
p.getActionSender().addSoundEffect(p, 4039, 1, 0, 0);
return;
}[/b]
